long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of the books you're reading and their chapters effortlessly with Manhwa Chapter Tracker! This Chrome extension helps you manage your reading progress, ensuring you never lose your place.

Features:
Track Book Names and Chapter Numbers: Easily keep track of your reading progress across multiple books and manhwa series.

Chapter Number Auto-Update: Automatically update the chapter number without notifications when you visit a stored book, and the new chapter number is greater than the previously stored chapter by at most 3.

Main Link Auto-Update: Automatically update the main link if you visit a stored book with a different main link.

Quick Access: Click on a book item to redirect to the last visited link.

Notification Optimization: Prevent duplicate notifications by checking the last notification's details before creating a new one. Easily toggle notifications on or off for updates.

Easy-to-Use Interface: A user-friendly interface makes tracking your reading progress simple and intuitive.

Support for Multiple Sources: Now supports Asura Scans, Reaper Scans, Manhwa Clan, and Flame Comics, enabling seamless tracking of your favorite manhwa series from these sites.

Want to contribute or check out the source code?
Visit my GitHub repository: https://github.com/Hitarth-Kothari/ChapterTracker
